dict.string: iTerm2 is a free terminal emulator.
iTerm2 needs to connect to iterm2.com to check for and download software updates.
If you deny this connection, you won't be notified when a new version is released and you'll be unable to update the Python runtime for the scripting API.
iTerm2 accepts connections from localhost on port 1912 for communicating with Python scripts using the scripting API.
The Python script that initiated the connection will not be able to proceed.
